CustomField.formula:
IMAGE( CASE(TEXT(copado__Last_Status__c),
'Completed with errors', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/warning16.png',
'Completed successfully', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/confirm16.png',
'Completed with warnings', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/confirm16.png',
'In Progress', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/loading.gif',
'Queued', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/loading.gif',
'/s.gif'),
TEXT(copado__Last_Status__c) )
CustomField.label: Last Status Icon
